Name: storage in hv powerflow
Description: storage units considered in hv powerflow calculations

Column.Name: scn_name
Column.Description: scenario name

Column.Name: storage_id
Column.Description: unique id

Column.Name: bus
Column.Description: id of associated bus

Column.Name: dispatch
Column.Description: Controllability of active power dispatch, must be flexible or variable

Column.Name: control
Column.Description: P,Q,V control strategy for PF, must be PQ, PV or Slack

Column.Name: p_nom
Column.Description: Nominal power

Column.Name: p_nom_extendable
Column.Description: Switch to allow capacity p_nom to be extended

Column.Name: p_nom_min
Column.Description: If p_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value

Column.Name: p_nom_max
Column.Description: If p_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by potential))

Column.Name: p_min_pu_fixed
Column.Description: If control=flexible this gives the minimum output per unit of p_nom for the OPF.

Column.Name: p_max_pu_fixed
Column.Description: If control=flexible this gives the maximum output per unit of p_nom for the OPF, equivalent to a de-rating factor

Column.Name: sign
Column.Description: power sign

Column.Name: source
Column.Description: Prime mover energy carrier

Column.Name: marginal_cost
Column.Description: Marginal cost of production of 1 MWh

Column.Name: capital_cost
Column.Description: Capital cost of extending p_nom by 1 MW

Column.Name: efficiency
Column.Description: Ratio between primary energy and electrical energy

Column.Name: soc_initial
Column.Description: State of charge before the snapshots in the OPF.

Column.Name: soc_cyclic
Column.Description: Switch: if True, then state_of_charge_initial is ignored and the initial state of charge is set to the final state of charge for the group of snapshots in the OPF

Column.Name: max_hours
Column.Description: Maximum state of charge capacity in terms of hours at full output capacity p_nom

Column.Name: efficiency_store
Column.Description: Efficiency of storage on the way into the storage

Column.Name: efficiency_dispatch
Column.Description: Efficiency of storage on the way out of the storage

Column.Name: standing_loss
Column.Description: Losses per hour to state of charge
